description: Contents: ʾOtiyot de-rabi ʿAḳivaʾ (ff. 2v-5r). Judah ben Solomon ha-Kohen Matkah, Midrash ha-Ḥokhmah (part 1) (ff. 6r-104(ii)v). Moses Maimonides, Milot ha-Higayon (Treatise on Logical Terminology) (ff. 105r-113r). Abraham bar Hiyya Savasorda, Tsurat ha-erets (ff. 117r-159(ii)r). Moses of Narbonne, Perush Kaṿanot ha-filosofim (Commentary on Ghazzālī's work) (ff. 160r-178r).
title: Miscellany of philosophical texts
author: Matkah, Judah ben Solomon, ha-Kohen
